snippet: Defensive end Robert Nkemdiche, the top recruit for the Class of 2013, said he would honor his commitment even if the Tigers did not offer a scholarship to his good friend and high school teammate, Ryan Carter.
abstract: Defensive end Robert Nkemdiche, the top recruit for the Class of 2013, said he would honor his commitment even if the Tigers did not offer a scholarship to his good friend and high school teammate, Ryan Carter.

headline.main: Top Recruit Nkemdiche Says He’s Committed to Clemson
headline.print_headline: Top Recruit Reaffirms Commitment to Clemson
